caption: Relating to the ownership of agricultural land by nonresident aliens or foreign entities.
summary: This bill prohibits nonresident aliens, foreign businesses, and foreign governments from purchasing or acquiring agricultural land in Texas. Chinese citizens who are not Texas residents would be impacted, along with Chinese businesses and government entities. The bill requires annual reporting of foreign-owned agricultural land. Existing Chinese property owners may keep their non-agricultural properties, but cannot acquire new agricultural lands.
translation: 该法案禁止非居民外国人、外国企业和外国政府购买或获得德克萨斯州的农业用地。不是德克萨斯州居民的中国公民、中国企业和政府实体都将受到影响。该法案要求每年报告外资持有的农业用地情况。现有的中国业主可以保留其非农业地产，但不能获得新的农业用地。
